seasonLinkInternal.description: Exchanges an email/password for an access_token. Only to be used by the SeasonLink app.

get.summary: Returns the current logged in user.

post.description: Creating a new user will return an object containing the user and the access_token in the response when successful.

200.description: Returns the access_token for the new user.

post.summary: Exchange a username (i.e. email) and password for an access token.
post.description: Logging in will return just the access_token in the response when successful. Follow up with a call to `/me` if you want to get the user details.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The user's email. SeasonLink does not have usernames, but the OAuth2 spec requires this to be the param name.

post.description:
Salts the supplied password and updates the User model with the
salted password hash.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Updated password to salt and add to User's account

get.description: Returns a User based on supplied Id.

post.summary: Updates a new user account with supplied information.
post.description: Updates the User account with group, notifications, or any other settings.

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: Group of the user (fan, player, parent, etc.).

parameters.name: birthday
parameters.description: Date of Birth of the user( string format - YYYY-MM-DD ).

parameters.name: plantIds
parameters.description: Ids of the plants you want

get.description:
Returns an array of Schools matching supplied query. Query can
be a case insensitve text search and/or a case sensitive
key/value pair.
get.summary: Retrieve Schools based on search terms or key values

get.description: Returns a Plant based on supplied Id.
Returns a List based on supplied Id.

Returns an array of Lists matching supplied query. Query can
be a case insensitve text search and/or a case sensitive
key/value pair.
get.summary: Retrieve Lists based on search terms or key values

post.summary: Updates a list with supplied information.

parameters.name: Plants
parameters.description: Array of plants for the list.

ErrorMeta.description: error meta object for API envelope response

errorType.description: Additional information about what went wrong, intended for the developer.

errorDetail.description: A localized string intended for the client to display back to the user directly.

SuccessMeta.description: success meta object for API envelope response

accounts.description: List of accounts associated with User

devices.description: List of devices associated with User

roles.description: List of roles associated with User

group.description: The Player/Fan/Parent setting of the User
